pullrequest.title: Fix for passing a composition into calculate_mass.

content.raw:
Thanks for participation, John.

*P.S. I was hoping to apply your fix to the `lev` branch alone (I try to only commit new versions to `default` for some vague reason), but this is not how my edit worked. Any idea how I could have done that?*
content.html:
Thanks for participation, John.

P.S. I was hoping to apply your fix to the lev branch alone (I try to only commit new versions to default for some vague reason), but this is not how my edit worked. Any idea how I could have done that?

pullrequest.title: Fix for passing a composition into calculate_mass.

content.raw:
Oh boy, I am not sure mercurial branching confuses me a great deal. My guess is that I would need to have committed the original changeset to the lev branch on my end. If you want to strip out the changesets, I would be happy to resubmit the pull request in the right branch (or you can download the raw patch, strip the changesets, and then reapply using `hg import` while in the correct branch). 

-John
content.html:
Oh boy, I am not sure mercurial branching confuses me a great deal. My guess is that I would need to have committed the original changeset to the lev branch on my end. If you want to strip out the changesets, I would be happy to resubmit the pull request in the right branch (or you can download the raw patch, strip the changesets, and then reapply using hg import while in the correct branch).

-John

pullrequest.title: Fix for passing a composition into calculate_mass.

content.raw: Thanks again, I think we can just leave it there this time.
content.html: Thanks again, I think we can just leave it there this time.
